Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • etf.dotsandboxes.bb170011d.graphics.Edge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameBoardObject, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Edge
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements GameBoardObject
    Represents an edge on the GameBoard which a player can play as a move
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
